GV06apastgcu:514: na tu darśapūrmamāsavadbrahmāṇaṃ, samānavidhānavacanānām codanāliṅgāni vinātra tadīyasya brahmamaḥ prāptyabhāvāt, 'brāhmaṇaṃ
GV06apastgcu:517: pitṛbhūtartvikpakṣe 'pi yaḥ piturbrahmā sa evātra niṣādyata iti niyamo nāsti //

GV06apastgcu:525: yadi hi tathā syāt, 'yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vidyāṃ vidvāṃsaṃ yaśo narcchet”
GV06apastgcu:527: brūyāt, na punastriguṇaiḥ 'yo dakṣiṇata āste tasmai varaṃ
GV06apastgcu:531: ceti vadatāṃ coktirītyā svārtaparatve sambhavati doṣatrayayuktaparisaṃkhyāśrayaṇaṃ nirhetukam
GV06apastgcu:534: 'ṅgārānnirūhya teṣvadhiśritya jvalatāvadyutya dve darbhāgre pratyasya triḥ

GV06apastgcu:558: yadyapi 'sarpirājyaṃ pratīyāt'(āpa.pa.2-25) iti paribhāṣāsiddhaṃ vilāpanaṃ, tathāpi vilīnamapyājyaṃ homārthe 'gnau karmārtha punarvilāpayet /
GV06apastgcu:562: punaḥ 'dadhna evāñjalinā juhoti”(āpa.gṛ.22-10) ityatra(2) paśuprabhavasya homadravyatve 'pi yadīyatadīyanyāyāddadhno bhaveyurityevamartham //
GV06apastgcu:566: athāṅrārānudīco nirūhyanirrvatya, teṣvaṅgāreṣu ājyadhiśritya, jvalatā tṛṇenāvadyutya adhogāminyā dīptyā dyotayitvā, dve darbhāgre aniyatāyāme
GV06apastgcu:567: tṛṇādyantardhāya chitvādbhissaṃspṛśya te yugapadājye prakṣipet 'dve'ityadhikaśabdāt, ācārācca
GV06apastgcu:568: atholmukamādāyājye pradakṣiṇaṃ triḥ paryagni kṛtvā samantato 'gnimāvartya
GV06apastgcu:570: atra nirūhaṇodvāsanayorudagapavargasya 'tathāpavargaḥ'(āpa.gṛ.1-6) iti siddhasya punarvidhānametayornityamudagevāpavargaḥ na tu daive vikalpenāpi
GV06apastgcu:571: prāgapavargaḥ, nāpi pitrye dakṣiṇato 'pavarga iti niyamārtham /
GV06apastgcu:577: avadeyotanaparyagnikaraṇāgnayostu yadā āyatanasthādupādānaṃ tadā tayoragnayerapavṛttakarmatvena laukikatvāt ttyāgaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:578: yadā tu nirūḍhāt tadā tadā tasminneva kṣepaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:582: tataste pavitre anuprahṛtyaīcārānukūlaṃ prahṛtya, yadi granthissyāt tadā

GV06apastgcu:586: yena juhoti tadagnau pratitapya darbhaiḥ saṃmṛjya punaḥ pratitapya prokṣya nidhāya darbhānadbhissaṃspṛśyāgnau praharati // ĀpGs_2.1 //
GV06apastgcu:591: tatkriyate darśapūrṇamāsayossammārjane ye dharmāsteṣāmiha prāptyarthamāhavanīye gārhapatye vā coditaṃ yatpratitapanaṃ tadasminnagnau bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:594: agnau praharatīti punaragnigrahaṇaṃ suksaṃmārjanadharmā iha pravartanta iti /
GV06apastgcu:595: pākayajñeṣu ca darvyā homaḥ, kalpāntare dṛṣṭatvāddarśanācca /

GV06apastgcu:597: yaccāyaṃ sakṛdupahatyeti upaghātaṃ sthālīpākāddarśayati tadapi nādarvyāmupapadyate /
GV06apastgcu:604: “madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇeme”tyatrāpi yathā syāt, agnihotre āgnihotrike ca tantre yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:607: yadayamaupakārye pārvaṇavaditi yatnaṃ karoti tat jñāpayati-añjalihomā
GV06apastgcu:610: yena pātreṇa darvyā sruveṇāñjalinā vā juhoti tadagnau pratitapyetyādi vyaktārtham /
GV06apastgcu:614: darvīnindā snuvavidhānārthā, na tu darvyā niṣedhārthā /
GV06apastgcu:616: tatra kevalājyahomeṣu ekaiva darvī sruvo vā, upastaraṇādyabhāvāt /
GV06apastgcu:617: carvādihomeṣu tu dve darvyau sruvau vā upastaraṇādyartha homārtha ca /
GV06apastgcu:618: upastaraṇādyarthasyāpi saṃskāraḥ, upastaraṇādi pradānāntasya homapadārthatvāt, śraute sruvasyāpi saṃskāradarśanāt, ācārācca /
GV06apastgcu:628: iha ca sammārgadarbhāṇāmagnāveva praharaṇam, na punarvaikalpikam /

GV06apastgcu:632: añjalestvapūpahome avadānaprāptyarthema 'pārvaṇavat”(āpa.gṛ.22-1) iti yantenāñjalihomā apūrvā yāvaduktadharmāṇa iti
GV06apastgcu:645: jñāpakārthantu, etat jñāpayati-vivāhādiṣviha saṃkīrtteṣveva samyāḥ, na tairatidiṣṭeṣu iti
GV06apastgcu:647: pārvaṇādiṣu ca pakkahomeṣu tathā”evamata ūrdhva”miti vaivāhikena sthālīpākāditi darśanāt prasaṅgaḥ vivāhādiṣu karmasuparidhyartheparidhānāṃ kārye paridhīnāṃ sthāna iti

GV06apastgcu:656: sīmante śamyāvidhānādeva tadvikāre caule caulavikāre ca godāne samyāprāptāvapi tayorgrahaṇaṃ sīmantavikāre 'pi puṃsavane tāsāṃ nivṛttyartham /

GV06apastgcu:665: 'numanyasveti paścādudīcīnaṃ sarasvate 'numanyasve tyuttarataḥ prācīnaṃ deva savitaḥ prasuve ti samantam // ĀpGs_2.3 //
GV06apastgcu:671: 'deva savitaḥ prasuve't etāvān mantraḥ kalpāntareṣu bhūyassu tathā darśanāt /
GV06apastgcu:672: bodhāyanīye ca vispaṣṭametat 'anvamaṃsthāḥ prāsāvīrit mantrāntān sannamayatī'(bau.gṛ.1-4.7) ti /
GV06apastgcu:681: atra 'deva savitaḥ prasuva'ityetāvāneva mantraḥ, narca ādipradeśaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:685: 'trāpi viniyogāyogyatvāt, ādipradeśe samudāyalakṣaṇāpatteḥ, yaju prāye mantrāṣṭake ṛco 'pratītatvāt, ūhapakṣe ārṣapāṭhabādhaprasaṅgāt,
GV06apastgcu:688: vispaṣṭaṃ caitat bodhāyanānāṃ, 'śranvamaṃsthāḥ prāsāvīriti mantrāntān sannamayati'(bau.gṛ.1-4-37) iti /
GV06apastgcu:689: evaṃ cottarapariṣecane 'anvamaṃsthāḥ prāsāvīḥ 'iti pūrvamantrebhyo viśeṣamātrasya pāṭhaḥ na punarabahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:698: paitṛkeṣu karmasu samantameva pariṣiñcati, na dakṣiṇata- prācīnam'ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:707: manasā mantroccāraṇaṃ tatra vidhīyata iti kṛtvā kāmyānāmādhārakalpānāmihāpravṛttiḥ prakṛtiviṣayatvātteṣām
GV06apastgcu:709: anye punaḥ ubhāvapi darvyaiva vedopabhṛtorabhāvāt upayamanamapi na bhavati /

GV06apastgcu:736: kathaṃ punarimāvajuhoticodanau darvīhomau ?ucyate-yadyapi juhotītyevaṃ na codanāsti. tathāpyāghārayatīti dīrghadhā eguṇakajuhoticodanārthatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:738: kiñca athājyabhāgau juhoti'(āpa.gṛ.2-6) ityājyabhāgau spaṣṭameva darvīhomau;tatsāhacaryādāghārāvapi tathā /
GV06apastgcu:743: iti gārhyaparibhāṣāmanusṛtya prāgapavargābhyāmudagapavargābhyāṃ vā dīrghadhārābhyāṃ juhoti, na tu koṇadigapavargābhyām /
GV06apastgcu:745: jevate tu darśapūrṇamāsavat prathamasya prajāpatiḥ, dvitīyasyendra
GV06apastgcu:751: (āpa.śrau.2-12-7) 'juhvehīti juhūmādatte'(āpa.śrau.2-13-2) ityādiṣu sarveṣu āghāradharmeṣu tanmantreṣu ca prāpteṣu 'āghārāvāghārayati'iti
GV06apastgcu:758: āghārayatītyatra ca sati gatyantare parisaṅkhyāyā anyāyyatvāt,

GV06apastgcu:766: (āpa.pa.3-8,9) iti paribhāṣā, ata eva āghārasamidho rnivṛttiḥ /

GV06apastgcu:794: yathopadeśaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā jayābhyātānānrāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ prājāpatyāṃ vyāhṛtīrvihṛtāḥ sauviṣṭakṛtīmittyupajuhoti
GV06apastgcu:800: yasmin yasmin karmaṇi yā- pradhānāhutaya ityupadśyante,
GV06apastgcu:812: sarvaprāyaścitteṣu, (āpa.śrau.3-12-9) evaṃ tarhi etat jñāpayati pākayajñavidhirayaṃ anyeṣāmapi keṣāñcit sādhāraṇa iti /

GV06apastgcu:826: vivāhādiṣu tantravidhānaniyamārtha yasmin gṛhamedhacoditāsteṣu atrāgnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānta iti jayādipratipadyata iti vā vacanaṃ tatraiva tantrapravṛttiḥ iti /

GV06apastgcu:849: vyāhṛtī vihṛtāḥ 'bhūḥ svāhā, bhuvaḥ svāhā suvaḥ svāhā'iti /

GV06apastgcu:906: nanvevaṃ 'agnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte'iti kimarthastatra tatra punarupadeśaḥ?utyate- yatra punaḥ 'apivottarayā juhuyāt'(āpa.gṛ.5-20)

GV06apastgcu:2466: atrocyate-evaṃ tarhyadhyāhāreṇa vā vipariṇāmena vā vyākhyāyate /
GV06apastgcu:2468: yadvā ye 'sya śthālīpākayāgasya karturapacitastasmā etadyāgakartā ṛṣabhaṃ
GV06apastgcu:2471: yo 'yaṃ loke vidyābhijanādisampattyā apacitaḥ tasmā ayametatsthālīpākakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti
GV06apastgcu:2474: evamata ūrdhva dakṣiṇāvarjamupoṣitābhyāṃ parvasu kāryaḥ // ĀpGs_7.17 //
GV06apastgcu:2478: gṛhamedhibhyāṃparvasu paurṇamāsīṣu cāmāvāsyāsu ca evamevāgneyasthālīpākakalpena sthālīpākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2480: sthālīpākena yājayatī”tyevamādiḥ tasmā ṛṣabhaṃ dadātī'tyevamanātaḥ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2483: tatra pārvaṇe vivāhanimittā viśeṣāḥ sakṛtpātrāṇi śamyā ityādayo na kartavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2488: yadayaṃ hṛdayasaṃsargānvārambhaṃ vidadhāti tat jñāpayati na pārvaṇādiṣvanvārambho bhavatīti
GV06apastgcu:2491: tena saṃveśanānte vivāhikarmaṇi niṣṭhite pañcamahāyajñādīnāṃ gṛhasthadharmāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2498: chandogāścāmananti -amāvāsyā cet pūrvamāpadyate paurṇamāseneṣṭvātha tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:2503: tasmāt parvasu cobhayorupavāsa iti prāptamupavāsaṃ prakṛtyaṃśenānūdya dvivacanena dvayoradhikāraḥ pradarśyate -upoṣitābhyāmiti /
GV06apastgcu:2510: ubhābhyāṃ parvasu kārya ityucyamāne parvasveva sthālīpākassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:2517: yathā 'etasyaiva revatīṣu'(tāṇḍya.brā.17-8-1) iti, yathā vā 'māsamagnihotraṃ juhoti'iti
GV06apastgcu:2518: tatra tu 'etasya''agnihotram'iti padābhyāṃ, iha tu evaṃpadeneti bhedaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2520: satyam, nāsti codanāliṅgāt, vacanāttvatideśaḥ kena vāryate ?
GV06apastgcu:2522: ataḥ kalpātideśa eva;'śvobhūte 'nvaṣṭakāṃ, tasyā māsiśrāddhena kalpo
GV06apastgcu:2527: apare tu-ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam (jai.sū.4-3-5) iti nyāyena prakṛtasyaiva sthālīpākasya 'evaṃ parvasu kāryaḥ';
GV06apastgcu:2529: etadapi na;evaṃ sati 'eṣa kārya'iti sūtraṃ syāt, 'natvevaṃ kārya iti /
GV06apastgcu:2533: atra ca 'ata ūrdhvam'iti vacanaṃ vivāhamadhye 'pi parvārambhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2554: iti vacanāt dhānyamuṣṭīnāṃ aṣṭāviṃśatyādhikaṃ śataṃ pūrṇapātram /
GV06apastgcu:2558: sāyaṃ prātarata ūrdhva hastenaite āhutī taṇḍulairyavairvā juhuyāt //
GV06apastgcu:2560: asmāt sthālīpākādūrdhva yāśca eto āhutī brīhitaṇḍulairyavairvājuhuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:2564: ete āhutī ityucyate- ye agnihotrāhutī āhitāgneste ete iti pratijñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2576: sthālīpākāntāditi ca sthālīpākaṃ vidhāya, 'ata ūrdhvam'iti vacanāt /
GV06apastgcu:2577: asya cārabbho 'nantaraṃ rātrāveva yadi nava nāḍyo nātītāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2584: 'ete'iti viśeṣaṇādatrāpi dvitīyāhutiḥ sviṣṭakṛtsthānītyā aṅgamityarthaḥ tenetāṃ vismṛtya karmasamāptau neṣā punarhotavyā /
GV06apastgcu:2616: asmādeva hetoḥ 'dvirjuhoti'(āpa.gṛ.2-11) ityādinā parisaṅkhyāya kṛtsnavidhānāccāgnihetrikavidhāvapi naiva vidyudvṛṣṭī //22//
GV06apastgcu:2621: tenapārvaṇenasthālīpākenāte 'smātpārvaṇādanyāni karmāṇi vyākhyātāni yānyācārādūgṛhāyante jñāyante tāni sarvāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:2623: yo 'yaṃ pārvaṇasya kalpaḥ 'evamata ūrdhva'ityādiḥ pūrṇapātrastu dakṣiṇetyeka ityevamantaḥ sa eva sarveṣāṃ pākayajñānāṃ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2626: nanvismin vaivāhke dharmā āmnātāḥ pārvaṇasyāpi tata evātidiṣṭāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2630: tena pakvaguṇeṣveva sthālīpākeṣu paśuṣu cāyamatideśo nājyaguṇakeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:2634: tena niṛtiṃ pākayajñene (āpa.dha.1-26) tyatraṃ patnīvatvaṃ parvaniyamaśca
GV06apastgcu:2637: vyākhyātānīti vacanāt vyākhyānameva pārvaṇenānyeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ, na prasṛtivikṛtibhāvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2639: ācārādyāni gṛhyanta iti vacanāt asmin śāstre a'nupadiṣṭānāmapi
GV06apastgcu:2645: cetnityastāvat 'upoṣitābhyāṃ varvasu kārya'(āpa.gṛ.7-17) iti parvasu bhavatvāt pārvaṇaḥ
GV06apastgcu:2646: tasya ca pārvaṇasyāyaṃ prakṛtitve sambandhīti'tasyedam'(pā.sū.4-3-120) iti pārvaṇaśabdādaṇpratyaye kṛte pārvama ityevaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2647: yadyapi karmāntarāṇāmapyayaṃ prakṛtiḥ, tathāpyasya pārvaṇasambadhitayā vyapadeśyatvameva yuktam ;yatho 'tra karmaṇi dravyadevatayorapyatideśaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2649: nanvevamapi śīghrāvagatasya nityasya pārvaṇasya prakṛtitye sambhavati kimiti vilambitāvagamyasya vaivāhikasya prakṛtitvamucyate ?iti cetna,
GV06apastgcu:2654: asya ca vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdāvācyatvaṃ dharmasāstre vyaktameva /
GV06apastgcu:2662: tasyopacāraḥ pārvaṇena vyākhyātaḥ'(āpa.dha.2-1-4....11) iti nityasya pārvaṇena vyākhyānābhidhānāt, parvasambandhinaḥ karmāntarasyātrāsambhavāt,
GV06apastgcu:2670: tasya ca ka4māntarasyopacāraḥ pārvaṇena nityena vyākhyāta ityāhuḥ tatkathaṃ dharmaśāstre vyaketaṃ vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdavācyatvamiti /
GV06apastgcu:2671: tanna;yato 'tra vratameva paramaprakṛtam, pāṇigrahaṇasya tu tadavadhitayā
GV06apastgcu:2674: gamyamānaṃ caitacchabdena parāmraṣṭuṃ priyabhojanādinā viśeṣayituṃ ca nārham /
GV06apastgcu:2680: śrutāvyavahitasya prakṛtasyaparvāhasyaiva parāmarśo viśeṣaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
GV06apastgcu:2685: anuvāde ca tasyopacāra iti dūrasyasya parāmarśo ghaṭate /
GV06apastgcu:2688: yasyeme vidhīyamānā upavāsapriyabhojanādayo dharmāssambandhinastasyopacāraḥ pārvamena vyākhyāta iti sādhyāhāramevedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam /
GV06apastgcu:2689: tasmāddharmaśāstre 'pi vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdavyapadeśyasyaiva prakṛtitvam, na nityasyeti siddham /
GV06apastgcu:2690: nanvemapi śīghrabodhakatvāt vaivāhikeneti vaktavye, kimarthamasya vivāhāṅgasyāpi sato vivīhasambandhaṃ tiraskṛtya 'pārvaṇena'ityāha
GV06apastgcu:2693: sarpabalyādīni karmāṇyanena vyākhyātāni, na tvanena tatsadṛśāni
GV06apastgcu:2700: auṣadhāni havīmaṣi paśuprabhavāni ca kāni katidhā ca ?iti
GV06apastgcu:2701: cet-puroḍāśaḥ, odano, yavāgūstaṇḍulāḥ, pṛthukāḥ, lājāḥ, saktavaḥ, puṣṭāni,
GV06apastgcu:2703: payo, dadhyā, jya, māmikṣā, vājina, bhavadānāni, paśurasa,śśoṇitaṃ, tvak,
GV06apastgcu:2709: iti sarpabalau punarvacanam ?ucyate-yadyapi śrautaāprayaṇe vaiśvadevādīnāṃ bhūyastvena paurṇamāsatantrāśaṅkāyāṃ aindrāgnasya mukhyatvāt 'mukhyaṃ vā
GV06apastgcu:2711: tantram'(āpa.śrau.6-29-5) iti darśitam, tathāpyatrānyeṣāṃ haviṣāṃ bahutve
GV06apastgcu:2714: tena māsiśrāddhe aṣṭakākarmaṇi ca pārvaṇameva tantram /
GV06apastgcu:2717: apūpahome tu 'pārvaṇavat'(āpa.gṛ.22-1) iti punarvacanamapūpamāṃsaudanapiṣṭānnahomānāṃ sthāne anukalpena vihitasyauṣadhahaviṣkasyāpi dadhihomasya pārvaṇatantraprāptiṃ jñāpayitum,
GV06apastgcu:2720: yathā 'yasya haviṣevatsā apākṛtā dhayeyustatsthāne vāyavyāṃ yavāgūṃ nirvapet'(āpa.śrau.9-1-23) iti sānnāyyasthāne vihitāyā
GV06apastgcu:2722: kecit-nityasya pārvaṇasya yaḥ kalpassa eva sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ kalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2725: ato 'nyānīti vacanādetatsadṛśānāṃ pakvaguṇānāmeva sthālīpākānāṃ paśūnāṃ cāyaṃ vikalpo, na tvājyaguṇakānām /
GV06apastgcu:2726: karmāṇīti vacanāt karmamātrasyaiva vyākhyānaṃ, na tu kartṛtaddharmakālādīnām /
GV06apastgcu:2728: ityatra paśau na patnīvattvam nāpi hṛdayasaṃsargādiṣu parvaṇo niyamaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2733: etadgṛhyopadiṣṭeṣu yatra vacanaṃ tatraiva tantraṃ, nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:2734: tenāgrayaṇe tantralopa iti tanna;yata upadiṣṭadharmakasya vaivāhikasya dharmātideśe 'pi naiva doṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2743: 'etena vaiśvasṛjā jyo vyākhyātaḥ (āpa.śrau.19-15-1) ityādau prakṛtivikṛtitvasya dṛṣṭatvāt
GV06apastgcu:2744: tathā naikasminnāgrayaṇe tantralopaphalārtha niyamārthāni bahūni sūtrāṇyārabdhavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:2753: tena pārvaṇe ye devate yasca sthālīpākaḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣu karmasu pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2754: tatra tatrepadiṣṭābhistu devatābhiḥ pārvaṇadevatayoḥ bādhe prāpte tannivṛttyartha vacanaṃ tatra coditānāṃ devatānāṃ deśavidhānārthañca-yo
GV06apastgcu:2755: 'yamagniḥ pārvaṇoyaśca sviṣṭakṛt, tāvantareṇa tayormadhye tā devatā yaṣṭavyā iti /
GV06apastgcu:2756: tatra pārvaṇasyāgneḥ pārvaṇameva haviḥ tatra tatra vihitānāṃ tatra tatra vihitam /
GV06apastgcu:2758: anye tu tatra vihitādeva haviṣaḥ pārvaṇadevatayorapījyāmicchanti /
GV06apastgcu:2759: apara īha- nātra pārdevate anūrdyate agniśca sviṣṭakṛcca /
GV06apastgcu:2760: kiṃ tarhi ?āgantuke ete anenaiva vacanena vidhīyete /
GV06apastgcu:2765: tathā ca śrauteṣu 'yena yajñenetrset kuryādeva tatrāgneyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:2767: pārvaṇavyākhyāteṣu sarveṣveva karmasu yathopadeśaṃ devatā yajati agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca yajati yoyamagnisviṣṭakṛt pārvaṇe dvitīyo devatāviśeṣaḥ taṃ ca yajati tasmādeva haviṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2770: asati samuccaye teṣu tasya pravṛttirna syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2774: antareṇa ityanena tu tasyaiva sviṣṭakṛto deśo
GV06apastgcu:2777: jayādu pratipadyata'iti ca kramaparaṃ vacanaṃ tatrāpi nityamagnisviṣṭakṛdasminnantarāle yaṣṭavyo bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:2781_0: yathopadeśaṃ sarpavalyādiṣu yāśca yāvatyaśca yena yena prakāreṇa mantravidhānādinopadṣṭāṃ
GV06apastgcu:2781_1: devatāstā eva bhavanti, na pārvaṇadevatāḥ na teṣu pārvaṇaṃ pradhānaṃ samuccetavyā
GV06apastgcu:2781_2: ityarthaḥ nanu vikṛtāvupakāramukhena tajjanakānāṃ dharmāṇāmatideśa-, pradhānaṃ
GV06apastgcu:2783: pārvaṇe ca sthālīpākahomayoḥ prathamo homaḥ pradhānam /
GV06apastgcu:2787: aṅgatvādatideśaḥ, adṛṣṭārthatvācca samuccayaḥ, yathopadiṣṭānāṃ prakṛtikḷptakramabādhabhayādante niveśaśca yukta eva /
GV06apastgcu:2794: yathopadeśaṃ devatāḥ ye vikṛtāvupadiṣṭāḥ te agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ cāntareṇa āgneya sauviṣṭakṛtayorhomayormadhye bhaveyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2798_0: vibhaktasya sūtrasya cāyaṃ vivakṣitor'thaḥ- sarveṣu tantravatsvauṣadhahomeṣu dadhihomeṣu
GV06apastgcu:2805: tathāgnimiti cobhayebhyaḥ pradhānāhutibhiyaḥ pūrvamevāgnimukhamityevamartha sviṣṭakṛdvanniyama iti //
GV06apastgcu:2806: kecit- 'yathopadeśaṃ devatā agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca'ityevamantamekaṃ sūtram /
GV06apastgcu:2807_1: vikṛtiṣu ca pārvaṇapradhānalope sati tasyāpi lopassyāt, sa mā bhūdityanena sūtreṇa
GV06apastgcu:2808: devatāḥ'ityanūdya, agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca kuryāt iti tāsu tasya samuccayo vidhīyate /
GV06apastgcu:2810: prakaraṇādvaikṛtapradhānahomānāṃ jayādīnāṃ ca madhye sarvāsvapi vikṛtiṣu sviṣṭakṛnnitya evetyarthaḥ
GV06apastgcu:2811: itarathā kvacittasya lepaḥ syāt, 'sthālīpākāduttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate'(āpa.gṛ.9-4) ityādi parisaṅkhyeti kṛtveti /
GV06apastgcu:2814: tathāpi yadi sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pradhānatulyadharmakatvaṃ, tadā tallope 'pi
GV06apastgcu:2817: vyartha caitat;svamate sviṣṭakṛtassamuccayavidhānādeva tridoṣāyāḥ parisaṅkhyāyā api nirastatvāt, tasya sarvatra nityatvenālopasiddheḥ //25//
GV06apastgcu:2825: atithiryasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ tadātithyam, gavālambha ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2827: nātra 'agnimiddhvā'; (āpa.gṛ.1-12)ityādi sāmānyamapi tantram, pārvaṇaṃ tu dūre;'kṛtsnavidhānāt yajaterapūrvatvam'(jai.sū.8-1-5) iti nyāyāt /
GV06apastgcu:2828: 'kṛtsnavidhānaṃ ca tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamekonnātamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti'(āpa.gṛ.22-4) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2833: agnau homeṣu ca āgneyasauviṣṭakṛtāvantareṇa ye homāsta eva pradhānāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2838: 'āryāḥ prayatā vaiśvadeva'iti codite vaiśvadevākhye karmaṇi devatopadeśo
GV06apastgcu:2841: ityevamādyāḥ tāḥ pradānakāle devatāḥ, tena viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ iti saṅkalpya gṛhasthena svagṛhe pākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2842: tathā pakvādevānnāt homā balayaśca tasyai tasyai devatāyai /
GV06apastgcu:2845: tasmāt na pṛthak pañcamahāyajñāḥ kartavyāḥ tatraiva vaiśvadevam yadagnau kriyate sa devayajñaḥ
GV06apastgcu:2849: tatra vaiśvadeve somāya svāheti dvitīyāhutiriti mantravyākhyākāreṇoktam /
GV06apastgcu:2853: tasya kalpasya sarvacaraṇārthatā na syāt, iṣyate ca /
GV06apastgcu:2855: atha taṃhi devatopadeśaḥ tatraiva kasmānna kṛtaḥ ?ihopadeśaprayojanamasmin
GV06apastgcu:2856: gṛhye tadapi vaiśvadevaṃ karmopadiṣṭaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:2857: tenāsmadīyānāṃ sa eva vaiśvadevakalpo nānyeṣu dharmaśāstreṣu coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2860: pravṛttinimittaṃ ca, viśve sarve devā atrejyanta iti /
GV06apastgcu:2861_0: iha ca mantravarṇasiddhānāṃ devatātvasyāvidheyatvāt, āgneyādayaṣṣaḍapi homāḥ baliharaṇāni
GV06apastgcu:2861_1: cānagnideśyānyapi sarvāṇyeva pradhānāni;na tu kiñcidapi śeṣāparanāmāṅgam, ityevaṃ
GV06apastgcu:2861_2: sūtrārthaḥ ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-yādinānagnau pradhānam, kintu śeṣa eveti tarhye taccheṣalakṣaṇe
GV06apastgcu:2862: na tu dṛṣṭam, nāpi sūtrakārektaṃ dṛśyate /
GV06apastgcu:2863: kintu puṇḍapitṛyajñe tāvadāpastambena hemaḥ piṇḍadānaṃ cobhayaṃ
GV06apastgcu:2864: pradhānamuktam, piṇḍadānaṃ prakṛtyaryadi jīvapitā, na dadyāt, āhomātkṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:2866: yadi hi piṇḍadānasyāṅgatā, tadā pradhānabhūtahomānuṣṭhāne sati,
GV06apastgcu:2876: tathaiva rākṣase gardabhapaśau anagnāveva pradhānam ;'apyasvavadānaiścareyuḥ'(āpa.śrau.9-15-3) iti vacanāt /
GV06apastgcu:2878: 'yadi vapā haviravadānaṃ vā skandet'(āpa.śrau.9-18-15) iti vapāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:2879: evamanagnāvapyanyāni bahūni pradhānam;'aupāsane pacane vā ṣaḍbhirādyaiḥ
GV06apastgcu:2880: pratimantraṃ hastena juhuyāt'(āpa.dha.2-3-17) iti parisaṅkhyayā cāsya
GV06apastgcu:2883: kiñca vaiśvadevamantreṣvapi 'agnaye svāhā, agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā'ityetayorapyāmnānāt prādhānyam /
GV06apastgcu:2891: tat prāgbhojanāt saprāyaścittaṃ sāṅgamanuṣṭheyam;kṛte tu bhojane pākayajñalopaprāyaścittameveti
GV06apastgcu:2892: kecit-vaiśvadeve viśve devā devatā vidhīyante nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham,
GV06apastgcu:2894: yāstu dharmaśāstre mantraviniyogāt kalpitāstāḥ pradānakāle devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2897: idaṃ ca vaiśvadevaṃ na pañcamahāyajñebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtam /
GV06apastgcu:2900: tatra yadagnau kriyate sa devayajñaḥ, yat baliharaṇaṃ sa bhūtayajñaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2901: yaddākṣiṇataḥ pitṛliṅgeneti sa pitṛyajñaḥ, yaccāgradānaṃ sa manuṣyayajñaḥ, iti /
GV06apastgcu:2903: tanna, svamate śrutyā coditān viśvān devān vacanaṃ vināpanīya,
GV06apastgcu:2904: tebhyassaṅkalpitasya haviṣo devatāntarebhyo mantravarṇāt kalpitebhyo dātumayuktatvāt /

GV06apastgcu:3363: brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhānītyucyate lokaparatiṣiddhānyupariśayyāsanādīni lokata eva pratyetavyānīti jñāpanārtham /

GV06apastgcu:3451: 1. dhanādiprāptyartha prasthitasya madhye parikṣavādau durnimitte jāte
GV06apastgcu:3453: arthaprādhvasya parikṣave parikāsane cāpa upaspṛśyottare yathāliṅgaṃ japet
GV06apastgcu:3458: parikṣave parikāsanevā durnimitte prāpte prāyaścittaṃ apa upaspṛsyottare ṛcau japet
GV06apastgcu:3463: tatra yasmin kṛte prayato manyate tatra tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:3466: atha pūrvasyāmṛci parikṣavaśabda ekatośa- vikṛto liṅgamityucyate tathāpyuttarasyāṃ parikāsanaliṅgaṃ nāstyeva /
GV06apastgcu:3484: iha ca vacanaprayojanaṃ vivāhārtha gaccha to 'pi eteṣu nimtteṣu prāyaścittametat yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:3486: idaṃ tu arthaprādhvasyeti vacanāt sarvārtha ca bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3490: arthamuddiśya yaḥ prasiddhamadhvānaṃ prasthitaḥ sor'thaprādhvaḥ, na tu snāna, brahmayajñodaka yagyaghāsādi kamuddiśya samīpadośaṃ prati nirgataḥ
GV06apastgcu:3491: tasyaparikṣavekṣavadhau parikāsanekāse ca durnimitte jāte apa upaspṛśya upasparśanamācamanaṃ sparśanamātraṃ vā yathātuṣṭi kṛtvottare 'anuhavaṃ
GV06apastgcu:3494: atra ca yathāliṅgamityanenaitat jñāpayati-pūrvayā varṇavyatyayona parikṣava eva prakāśyaḥ, uttarayā tvadhyāhṛtaṃ parikāsanameva /
GV06apastgcu:3495: yathā caite ṛcau kṣavadhukāsāveva tātparyeṇa prakāśayataḥ, tathā vyākhyāte bhāṣyakāreṇa
GV06apastgcu:3496: kecit-yathāliṅgamiti na kevalaṃ parikṣave parikāsane cānayorjapaḥ anyeṣu

GV06apastgcu:3507: sigasi nāsīti dīrghānte prāpte chāndaso hrasvaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:3531: taduktaṃ purastāt brahmacaryavidhānasya dṛṣṭārthatvāt yāvatā tapasārthasiddhiṃ manyate tāvat kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:3542: pārvaṇātideśāt ekasyaiva brāhmaṇasya bhojane prāpte bahutvaṃ vidhīyate /

GV06apastgcu:3559_0: śvoyat karaṇīyaṃ karmatattiṣyeṇa nakṣatreṇasampādyata iti kṛtvā pūrvedyussiddhivācanānte
GV06apastgcu:3559_1: karmaṇi kṛte pitrādinā ṛtvijā yajamānabhūtā vadhūḥ yatra pradeśe pāṭhā tiṣṭhati tatra
GV06apastgcu:3562: pāṭhotthāpanādi bhartṛparigrahaṇāntaṃ karma śvobhūte paridyustiṣyo bhavatīti kṛtvā pūrvedyuḥśvastiṣyaḥpunarvasū ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3563_0: tasmin nakṣatre pitrādinā siddhivācanānte karmaṇi kṛte, anantaraṃ vadhūryatra bhūmau
GV06apastgcu:3563_1: pāṭhāsti tatra gatvā tāṃpāṭhāṃ trissaptaiḥekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ 'yadi vāruṇyasi'; ityetābhyāṃparikiratiparito
GV06apastgcu:3565: śvobhūte uttarayotthāpyottarābhistisṛbhirabhimantryottarayā praticchannāṃ hastayorābadhya śayyākāle bāhubhyāṃ bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyādupadhānaliṅgayā // ĀpGs_9.6 //
GV06apastgcu:3567: kṛtvā parikiraṇamupoṣya tataḥśvobūtetāṃ pāṭhāṃ itthāpayati khanitreṇa khātvotkhidatiuttarayarcā “imāṃ khanīmī”tyetayī /
GV06apastgcu:3570: tasyā mūlaṃ dvedhā pracchidya hastayorāvadhnāti uttarayarcā'ahamasmī'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:3571: praticchannāṃ yathā bhartā na paśyati tathetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3572: ubhayatra mantrasyāvṛttiḥ ābadhya tato rātrau śayyākāle bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyāt /
GV06apastgcu:3573: upadhānaliṅgayāṛcā 'upate 'dhā'mityetayā uttarayeti vaktavye upadhānaliṅgayeti vacanaṃ parigrahe viśeṣavidhānārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3574: yathā mūlayoḥ anyataradadhastādupadhānaṃ bhavati itaraccopariṣṭādapidhānaṃ tathā parigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ //8//
GV06apastgcu:3581: kecit-ābadhya pāṭhāmūlayorhastayorupadhānameko 'nyaścāpidhānaṃ yathā syāt tathā parigṛhṇīyāditi
GV06apastgcu:3584: yadi bhāryā bhartari na ramate tadā naivaitatkarma bhavatīti pradarśanārthamidaṃvaśyaḥ patirbhavati bhāryāyāḥ na bhāryā bharturiti

GV06apastgcu:3592: asminnapi pakṣe aupāsana evāgniḥ yo 'syā vivāhena sampāditaḥ yā saptanīṃ bādhate /

GV06apastgcu:3613: sadeti vacanaṃ ca siddhe 'pi sapatnībādhanakāme karmāntaraṃ veti //9//
GV06apastgcu:3614: yakṣmagṛhītāmanyāṃ vā brahmacaryayuktaḥ puṣkarasaṃvartamūlairuttarairyathāliṅgamaṅgāni saṃmṛśya pratīcīnaṃ nirasyet // ĀpGs_9.10 //
GV06apastgcu:3617: tena gṛhītāṃbhāryā anyāṃ vā svāṃ striyaṃ mātṛprabhṛtiṃ jñātvā bhaiṣajyamidaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:3627: rājyakṣmaṇā gṛhītāṃ, anyāṃ vā rājayakṣmaṇo 'nyaiḥ kuṣṭhādibhirgṛhītāṃ vā vadhūṃ taddhitaiṣī
GV06apastgcu:3631: kecit yakṣmagṛhītāṃ bhāryā anyāṃ vā mātrādiṃ puṣkarasya saṃvartaiḥ parimaṇḍalākāraiḥ mūlairiti
GV06apastgcu:3636: praśne paṭhitān mantrān sārthān veda tasmai /
GV06apastgcu:3639: teṣāṃ vadhūvāsa iti viśeṣaṇamanyasyāḥ striyāḥ yakṣmagṛhītāyāḥ vāsaso dānanivṛttyartham /
GV06apastgcu:3640: etadvida iti ca bhaiṣajyakarmakṛta ityarthaḥ mantreṣu tu parādehi ityādiṣu vivāhakāle parihitasya vadhūvāsasaḥ sparśanindā /
GV06apastgcu:3642: kalpāntare ca tadvyaktam -”caritavrataḥ sūryāvide vadhūvastraṃ dadyāt”(āśva.gṛ. 1.8.13) iti /
GV06apastgcu:3647: etadvideetatkarma samantrārtha yo vetti tasmai 'parā dehi'ityādibhiścata
GV06apastgcu:3650: pañcamyāṃ 'parā dehi'ityādibhiścaritavratāyaetadvidesūryāvide, ya etān mantrān sārthān veda tasmai dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:3652: asya ca samāveśanānantaramupadeṣṭa vyasya ihopadeśo hṛdayasaṃsargārthe karmaṇi śamyājñāpanārthamiti
GV06apastgcu:3661: atha caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ atha daśamaḥ khaṇḍaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3666: yena ācāryakusamupanīyate kumāraḥtadupanayanaṃ nāma karma śrautaḥ puruṣasaṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3669: kathaṃ punarupanayanasya prādhānyam?yasmādanupanītasya śrautasmārteṣu sarveṣu karmasvanadhikāraḥ
GV06apastgcu:3680: tathā cāyamarthaḥ- upanayanākhyaṃ karma vaikalpikakalpoktyā vistṛtaṃ balavatpramāṇopapannaṃ asādhāraṇaiśśabdairvakṣyāma iti /
GV06apastgcu:3684: kiñci gṛhyopadiṣṭakarmasu gṛhasthasyaivādhikāro na brahmatāriṇa ityevaṃrūpaṃ viśeṣaṃ jñāpayitumapratijñaṃ vivāhamupadiśya upanayanakalpopadeśaḥ sapratijñaḥ kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:3685: asya ca kalpasya dharmaśāstre 'upanayanaṃ vidyārtasya'(āpa.dha.1-1-9) itya trānupadeśaḥ sarvacaraṇārthatāṃ nivartayitumiti //1//
GV06apastgcu:3688: yasmin varṣe garbho bhūtvā śete tadvarṣa garbhaśabdenocyate tadaṣṭamaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīmānigarbhāṣṭamānivarṣāṇi
GV06apastgcu:3690: apara āha-janmaprabhṛti saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ garbhamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3692: tatra caturṣu varṣeṣvayogyatvāt caulādisaṃskārāntaravirodhācca pañcamādiṣu triṣupanayanamiti
GV06apastgcu:3693: atra ṣaṣṭhasaptamayoḥ kāmyamupanayanaṣṭame nityamityayaṃ viseṣo na syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3695: kiṃca pañcame ṣaṣṭhe vā varṣe vartamāne kathaṃ garbhavarṣamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati
GV06apastgcu:3697: tasmāt saptame vartamāna eva garbhavarṣamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3702: rājanyavaiśyayoḥ viśeṣopadeśā deva garbhāṣṭamavidheḥ brāhmaṇaviṣayatve siddhe brāhmaṇavidhiḥ śrutyanuvāda eva /
GV06apastgcu:3708: tadaṣṭamaṃ yeṣāṃ janmādīnāṃ saptānāṃ tāni garbhāṣṭamāni varṣāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:3710: evaṃ yadyati janmādisaptasvapyupanayanaṃ prāptaṃ,tathāpi janmādiṣu triṣu caulāntaiḥ garbhasaṃskārairavaruddhatvānna kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:3714: nanūttaratra 'rājanyaṃ''vaiśya'miti viśeṣopādānādeva garbhāṣṭamavidhirbraahmaṇa syaivetyarthasiddhatvāt brāhmaṇamiti na vaktavyam /
GV06apastgcu:3718: kecit-garbhāṣṭama eva varṣe, na tu ṣaṣṭhasaptamayoḥ
GV06apastgcu:3736: dharmaśāstre tu 'vasante brāhmaṇam'(āpa.gha.1-1-19) ityādiḥ 'śiśire ca vā sarvān'iti bharadvājagṛhyoktaśiśirapratiṣedhārthaḥ
GV06apastgcu:3739: brāhmaṇānbhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā kumāraṃ bhojayitvānuvākasya prathamena yajuṣāpaḥ saṃsṛjyoṣṇāśśītāsvānīyottarayā śira unatti // ĀpGs_10.5 //
GV06apastgcu:3742: tataḥ śvobhūte brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tairāśiṣo vācayati-piṇyāhaṃ
GV06apastgcu:3751: uttareṇa yajuṣetyeva siddhe anuvākasya prathamena yajuṣetyuktaṃ saṃjñākaraṇārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3752: tena uṣṇena vāyavudakenetyeṣa ityatrānuvākasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3753: anyathā saṃśayaḥ syāt- anuvāko mantrā veti /
GV06apastgcu:3755: atmanaśca nāpitasya ca yā undanārthāstāḥ saṃsṛjati taccānyeṣāṃ
GV06apastgcu:3759: mantravatassarvakṛtyeṣu bhojayet'(āpa.dha.2-15-11) iti vihitaṃ, yadeva nāndīśrāddhamabhyudayaśrāddhamiti prasiddhaṃ, tadevocyate /
GV06apastgcu:3765: śvobhūte ca brāhmaṇānāṃ bhojanaṃ, bhuktavadbhirevāśiṣāṃ vācanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3769: 'bhojana ācamane svādhyāye ca yajñopavītī syāt'iti dharmaśāstravacanāt //
GV06apastgcu:3773: kecit-evamantaṃ mātāpitarau kurutaḥ, ata ūrdhvamācārya iti //
GV06apastgcu:3776: atra cānuvākagrahaṇaṃ gṛhyamantrāssamāmnātā eva na kalpasūtrasthā iti jñāpanārtham /

GV06apastgcu:4841: kiñca sūtrakārāṇāṃ naiveyaṃ sailī dṛṣṭacarī-yaduta sāṅgaṃ pradhānamuktvā paścādathādinā sūtreṇa vaikalpikānāṃ prakārabhedānāma- bhidhānamiti /
GV06apastgcu:4842: eva meva 'athaitadaparaṃ daghna evāñjalinā juhoti (āpa.gṛ.22-10) ityasyāpi vyākhyānam /
GV06apastgcu:4843: prayogastu-brahmacāriliṅgāni mekhalādīni tyaktvā tīrthe tūṣṇīṃ snātvā,
GV06apastgcu:4845: cāgnim'iti vidhinopasamādhāya, tatra prajāpatiṃ manasā dhyāyan tūṣṇīmeva samidhamādadhāti
GV06apastgcu:4847: yatrāsmā apacitiṃ kurvanti tatkūrca upaviśati yathāpurastāt // ĀpGs_13.2
GV06apastgcu:4850: tasyāsmin kāle bandhubhirapacitiḥ kāryā;gomadhuparkaraho vedādhyāya iti vacanāt /
GV06apastgcu:4852: sādhu vratasnāta marghayiṣyāmo bhavantamiti nigadenāvedanaṃ kauṣītakinassamāmananti /
GV06apastgcu:4855: tatra yatra deśe 'smai apacitiṃ kurvanti bāndhavāḥ, tatra tairdatte kūrce
GV06apastgcu:4859: yatra yasmin svadharmayuktasya kuṭumbino gṛhe ātithyārthamāgatāyāsmai snātakāyāpacitiṃ pūjāṃ madhuparkaakhyāṃ kurvate kuṭumbinaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4862: tat tatra gṛhe tairdatte kūrca upaviśati /
GV06apastgcu:4863: yathāpurastāt upanayane ācāryaḥ 'rāṣṭrabhṛdasi'iti yajuṣā upaviśati tathā
GV06apastgcu:4868: evaṃrājā sthapatiśca yathā brāhmaṇaḥ snātakaḥ kūrce upaviśati /
GV06apastgcu:4870: evaṃ rājā sthapatiśca pūjya mānau uttarābhyāṃyajurbhyā yathāliṅgamupaviśataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4871: tatra kṣatriyo rāṣṭhrādhipatirabhiṣkto rājyāya sāmrājyaṃ tasya liṅgam /
GV06apastgcu:4876: mityucyate-yathā prathamasya mantrasya liṅgāt viniyogaḥ evamuttarayorapi prajñāpanārtham
GV06apastgcu:4883: yathā brāhmaṇaḥ pūjyo mantreṇopaviṣṭaḥ,evaṃ rājā sthapatiścottarābhyāṃyathāliṅgaṃ 'rāṣṭrabhṛdasi samrāḍāsandī'iti rājā, ';
GV06apastgcu:4885: rājā ca kṣatriya eva, na tu prajāpālanakartānyavarṇo 'pi /
GV06apastgcu:4886: nanu kṣatriye rājaśabdaprayoga āndhrāṇāṃ, bhāryāṇāṃ tu prajāpālanādikarrtayeva, tatkathaṃ balavadāryaprayogabādhena rājā kṣatriya
GV06apastgcu:4896: atha madhuparkapradātā pādaprakṣālanārtha apa upasaṃgṛhya 'āpaḥ pādyā'iti
GV06apastgcu:4898: atha apacetā pādaprakṣālanārthā apa upasaṅgṛhya 'āpaḥ pādyāḥ'iti prāha /
GV06apastgcu:4902: uttarayābhimantrya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchetsavyaṃ śūdrāya //
GV06apastgcu:4904: atha pūjyamānastā apaḥ uttarayarcā”āpaḥ pādāvanejanī”ritye tayābhimantrya prakṣālayitre 'brāhmaṇāya dakṣṇaṃ pādaṃ pūrva prayacchet prasārayet /
GV06apastgcu:4910: patnīyajamānau jaṅghe dhāvata iti yajñe viśeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4911: āpaḥ pādyā iti prakaraṇādeva siddhe pādagrahaṇamuttaratra pādapratyayo mābhūdityevamartham
GV06apastgcu:4916: atra brāhmaṇaśūdrāveva prakṣālayitārau, na tu rājanyavaiśyau;tayoranabhidhānāt /
GV06apastgcu:4917: anye tu-kṣatriyavaiśyābhyāṃ aniyamena pūrva pādaṃ prayacchediti //5//
GV06apastgcu:4921: tathā svena hastenāvanektuḥ pāṇī saṃspṛśe (bau.gṛ-1-2)diti kalpāntaram /
GV06apastgcu:4926: yajuṣā ātmānaṃ hṛdayadeśe pratyabhimṛśet pratilomena pāṇinā spṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:4929: kūrcābhyāṃ parigṛhya mṛnmayenār 'haṇīyā āpa 'iti prāha // ĀpGs_13.7 //
GV06apastgcu:4931: tataḥ pradātā mṛṇmaye pātre upanītā apaḥkūrcābhyāmadhastādupariṣṭācca parigṛhya 'arhaṇīyā āpa'iti prāha nivedayati /
GV06apastgcu:4933: athārhayitā mṛnmaye pātra arhaṇārthāḥ puṣpākṣatasaṃyuktāḥ apa ānīya,
GV06apastgcu:4942: atha pūjyastā apaḥ 'āmāgan'ityetayābhimantrya tāsāmekadeśe stoke svāñjalau
GV06apastgcu:4946: atha tāsāmapāṃ śeṣaṃ pṛrvasyāṃ diśi nayati pradātā /
GV06apastgcu:4947: tat nīyamānaṃuttarayarcā' samudraṃ va'ityetayābhimantrayate pūjyamānaḥ mānaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4948: etasminkāle vastrayugalaṃ kuṇḍalayugaṃ gāṃ srajaṃ yaccānyadalaṅkaraṇārtha tatsarva dadyāt
GV06apastgcu:4951: atha tāsāṃ śeṣaṃ dātrā purastāt nīyamānaṃ pūjyaḥ 'samudraṃ vaḥ'ityetayā
GV06apastgcu:4953: kecit-asmin kāle bhojanānte vā pūjyāya vastrakuṇḍalayugādyālaṅkaraṇaṃ dātavyam;anyathāyaṃ pūjita eva na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4956: dadhi madhviti saṃsṛjya kāṃsyena varṣīyasā pidhāya kūrcābhyāṃ parigṛhya 'madhuparka 'iti prāha // ĀpGs_13.10 //
GV06apastgcu:4958: varṣīyasā bṛhatā kāṃsyena pātreṇa madhuparka prāha /
GV06apastgcu:4960: tenobhayoḥ pātrayoḥ kāṃmya niyamaḥ siddho bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4961: itiśabdaḥ prakāre-dadhi madhviti vā payo madhviti veti //10//
GV06apastgcu:4962: dadhi madhvityetaddvayaṃ niyamavidhānāt kasmiścitpātre saṃsṛjya, tato varṣīyasā bṛhatā kāṃsyena pātreṇa pidhāya /
GV06apastgcu:4964: anye tu apidhānaṃ kāṃsyaṃ pradarśanārtham, tenetaradapi kāṃsyameveti //10//
GV06apastgcu:4969: pūrvokte dve dadhi madhviti vā payo madhviti vā,ghṛtañca tṛtīyam //11//
GV06apastgcu:4971: tasmin pakṣe pūrvokte dadhimadhunī ghṛtaṃ ca saṃsarjanīyāni //11//
GV06apastgcu:4979: uttarābhyāmabhintrya yajurbhyāmapa ācāmati purastādupariṣṭāccottarayā triḥ prāśyānukampyāya prayacchet // ĀpGs_13.13 //
GV06apastgcu:4990: tatra prayogaḥ amṛtopastaraṇasītyupastaraṇīyā apa ācamya madhuparka mantreṇa prāśyācamya evaṃ dvistūṣṇīṃ prāśyāpidhānīyā apa ācāmati /
GV06apastgcu:4992: śeṣaṃ madhuparkaprāśanaśeṣaṃanukampyāyaanugrāhyāya putrāya bhrātre vā samāvṛttāyaiva prayacchet
GV06apastgcu:4994: somabhakṣaṇe madhuparkaprāśane bhojane ca madhye nocchiṣṭateti śiṣṭāḥ smaranti //13//

GV06apastgcu:5001_1: na tu brahmacāriṇe, 'na cāsmai śrutivipratiṣiddhamucchiṣṭaṃ dadyāt'(āpa.dha.1-4-5)
GV06apastgcu:5001_2: iti niṣedhāt nanviha madhye śuddhyarthamupastaraṇānantaramācamanaṃ na kartavyam;asmākaṃ

GV06apastgcu:5013: somapāne punaḥ 'na somenocchiṣṭā bhavanti'iti vacanādante 'pi naivācamanam
GV06apastgcu:5014: api caitadācamanam śikābandhanādivat kartuḥ saṃskārakam, sannipāti ca anuktamapyapekṣitamanyato grāhyamiti nyāyavidaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:5049: uttarayābhimantrya tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti // ĀpGs_13.16 //
GV06apastgcu:5058: tatrāmuṣyetyasya sthāne pradāturnāmanirdeśaḥ mama ca yajñaśarmaṇaśceti
GV06apastgcu:5059: tataḥ pradātā tenāsambhane 'nujñāte laukikyā'vṛtā tasyā gorālambhaṃ kṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:5060_0: vapāmutkhidya vapāśrapaṇībhyāṃ parigṛhya aupāsane pacane vā śrapayitvā tāmupastīrṇābhighāritāṃ
GV06apastgcu:5060_1: madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayarcā ' gniḥ prāśnātvi'tyetayā tasminnevāgnau
GV06apastgcu:5061: hutvā tato māṃsaṃ saṃskṛtyānnena saha tasmā upaharanti /
GV06apastgcu:5063: palāśaparṇenetyeva siddhe madhyamenāntamenetivacanaṃ dviparṇasya palāśavṛntasya parṇena homo mā bhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:5064: abhāvavikalpārtha vā pūrva madhyamena tadabhāve antameneti //17//
GV06apastgcu:5067: amuṣyetyasya sthāne cārhayiturnāma viṣṇuśarmaṇa iti gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:5070: abhimantryeti ca ktavāpratyayaḥ kriyāvidhāna mātrārtha eva, na tu samānakartṛkatvārthaḥ
GV06apastgcu:5072: madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇena laukikenājyenopastīrya kṛtsnāṃ vapāṃ sakṛdevāvadāyābhighārya 'agniḥ prāśanātu'ityetayā tena parṇena svāgenau
GV06apastgcu:5074: tatra ca madhyamenāntamena veti vacanaṃ dviparṇapratiṣedhārthamabhāvavikalpārtha vā /
GV06apastgcu:5076: ayaṃ ca saṃjñapanapakṣaḥ kaliyugānācāreṣu paṭhitatvādidānīṃ tyājya eva
GV06apastgcu:5080: atha yadi gāmutsṛjatyayaṃ pūjyamānaḥ sa gauriti prokte mantrān uttarāṃścaturo 'yajñe vardhatā'mityupāṃśu japati /
GV06apastgcu:5082: pradātā ca tāmuttsṛjyānyat māṃsaṃ kalpayati, 'nāmāṃso madhuparko
GV06apastgcu:5086: japatvādeva siddhe upāṃśuvacanaṃ niyamārtham-uttare catvāra eva mantrāḥ
GV06apastgcu:5091: tena brahmaṇaḥ evaiṣa vikalpaḥ siddho bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:5100: annaṃ proktamupāṃśūttarairabhimantrya oṃ kalpayate tyuccaiḥ // ĀpGs_13.18
GV06apastgcu:5106: tadannaṃ peroktamuttaraiḥ pañcabhirmantrairbhūtamityādibhiḥ bhoktopāṃśvabhimantrya oṃkalpayatetyuccaiḥ prasauti /
GV06apastgcu:5107: prasūtāḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ pariveṣanti caturo nānāgotrān brāhmaṇān bhojayateti brūyettoṣu bhuktavātsvannamasmā upāharantīti (bau.gṛ.1-2) kalpāntaram
GV06apastgcu:5108: atha dātā siddhamannaṃ 'bhūtaṃ'iti mantreṇa pūjyāya prabrūyānnivedet /
GV06apastgcu:5109: kuta etat ?'sijjhe 'nne tiṣṭhan bhūtamiti svāmine prabrūyāt';
GV06apastgcu:5118: ācāryāyartvije śvaśurāya rājña iti parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhya etatkāryam // ĀpGs_13.19
GV06apastgcu:5121: tebhyaścaturbhyaḥ parisaṃvatsaraṃ vipreṣyopatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ gṛhamātiśyenāgatebhyaḥ etadapacitkarma kūrcādi bhojanāntaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:5123: niveśe hi vṛtte naiyamikāni?śrūyante agnihotramatithayaḥ iti vacanāt /
GV06apastgcu:5128: tena vivāhāda- nantaraṃ ācāryaśvaśurābhyāṃ nimantryāpacitiḥ kartavyā /
GV06apastgcu:5130: atha tebhya eva saṃvatsaraṃ vipro ṣyopagatebhyaśca kartavyamiti //20//
GV06apastgcu:5131: yadetadarhaṇaṃ kūrcādi bhojanāntaṃ gṛhasthena snātakāya snānadivasa evāgatāya kartavyamiti
GV06apastgcu:5132: tadācāryādibhyaḥparisaṃvatsarātsaṃvatsarādūrdhva gṛhamupatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ upāgatebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ kārya;na tu snātakavat sakṛt /
GV06apastgcu:5137: ācāryāyartvije śvaśurāya rājña iti parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyo gaurmadhupa4kaśca /
GV06apastgcu:5140: śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthagavā saha madhuparko vihitaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5141: kimarthamiha punarvidhīyate?utyate- iha vikalpena vihitasya trivṛtaḥ pāṅktasya ca tasmin gomadhuparke avedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya ca dīyamāne ca prāptyartham /
GV06apastgcu:5143: tadācāryartvidādhyāyaśvaśurarājabhya eva parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ kāryam, snātakavedādhyāyatithibhyastu sakṛdevetyevamartham //19//
GV06apastgcu:5146: sakṛt na prativatasaraṃ kalau gorālambhsya nṣedhādraurityuttkā yajño vardhatāmityādi japet madhyamantralopaḥ)pravaktre vedasya vedārthasya ca
GV06apastgcu:5148: evaṃ bhūtāyopasthitāya sakṛdetadapacitikarma kartavyaṃ, na pratisaṃvatsaramiti //21//________________________
GV06apastgcu:5149: pravaktā yaḥ padavākyapramāṇābhyāṃ prakarṣeṇa vakti sādhuśabdānāmuccārayitā, pramāṇopaṃpannaṃ vyākhyātā cetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5150: citraḥ prakāśaḥ loke prasiddha ityarthaḥ . idaṃ pravaktureva viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:5154: yassaṣaḍaṅgaṃ vedamadhīte, arthāśca jānāti sa vedādhyāyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5155: nanu-sāmayācārike gomadhuparke dharmā nopadiṣṭāḥ, sa kathaṃ kartavyaḥ?ucyate-nāmadheyaṃ dharmagrāhakamti mīmāṃsakāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5156: tena gṛhye yājñikaprasiddhyā madhuparkasaṃśike karmaṇi upadiṣṭā eva dharmāḥ 'gomadhiparkarahaḥ'ityatra madhuparkanāmnā atidiśyante,
GV06apastgcu:5158: 'dadhimantho madhumanthaḥ'(madhuparkaḥ)(āpa. śrau.6-32-5) ityatra tu dakṣiṇādravyasya karmavaddhamārkaaṅkṣā bhāvānnātideśaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5162: ayamatra niścitor'thaḥ ācāryāyartvije vedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthādhikagavā vinā gārhyaḥ sāmayācāriko vā madhiparkaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5164: avedādhyāyāya śvaśurāyādhikagavā vinā gārhyaḥ atithivarāpacitebhyo vedādhyāyebhyaḥ saha gavā dharmoktaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5165: avedādhyāyābhyāṃ tu varāpacitābhyāṃ snātakāya ca snānadina evāgatāya gavā vinā gṛhyokto dharmokto vā /
GV06apastgcu:5166: prakāśāya ca pravaktre vinā gavā gārhyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5171: anyathā saṃvatsaramapi proṣitābhyāṃ sakṛdapi na sidhyet /
GV06apastgcu:5172: ṛtvije ca karmaṇi karmaṇi pūjā kāryā /
GV06apastgcu:5179: sāmayācārikeṣu sarvācaraṇārthena vihitāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ, gārhyasyāsmadīyānāṃ dharmātideśārthatvāt
GV06apastgcu:5180: na ca nāmnā dharmātideśaḥ, gomadhuparkaśabdayoḥ 'madhumantho madhuparkaḥ';
GV06apastgcu:5183: tathā vedasya vedārthasya ca pravaktre ctrāya etatsakṛtkāryamiti /
GV06apastgcu:5193: sīmantonnayanaṃ prathame garbhe caturthe māsi // ĀpGs_14.1 //
GV06apastgcu:5196: sa unnīyate yasmin karmaṇi tatsāmantonnayanannāyakarma garbhasaṃskāraḥ /

GV06apastgcu:7128: iti yājñavalkyaviṣṇusmṛtyoḥ viṣṇupurāṇe ca vidhidarśanāt mātāmahaśrāddhamapi nityamevāvagamyate
